project.teaser: Building on the Horizon 2020 project GENDERACTION, the overall goal of GENDERACTIONplus is to contribute to the coordination of gender equality and inclusiveness objectives of the new European Research Area through the development of a policy community of practice consisting...
project.objective: Building on the Horizon 2020 project GENDERACTION, the overall goal of GENDERACTIONplus is to contribute to the coordination of gender equality and inclusiveness objectives of the new European Research Area through the development of a policy community of practice consisting of national authorities from 11 MS and 2 AC and 7 MS Associated partners and an RFO community of practice from 8 MS and 2 AC and 9 Associated partners. The coordination network covers a total of 23 MS and 3 AC with 26 project partners and 18 Associated partners. Specifically, the project aims to: 1) Develop strategic policy advice on existing and emerging policy solutions in the key thematic areas (intersectionality and inclusiveness; gender-based violence; gender dimension in research, innovation and teaching; monitoring and evaluation of ERA gender equality actions; supporting institutional change through gender equality plans); 2) Enhance the policy-making process through engaging with stakeholders, CSOs and citizens; 3) Build capacities, competence and expertise for gender equality and mainstreaming in R&I among the policy and RFO community members, with special attention to countries with a less comprehensive policy; 4) Create impact through communication, dissemination and exploitation, including national impact plans and an EU impact plan, policy briefs and position papers based on the policy advice developed. The impact of GENDERACTIONplus will be: 1) Advanced policy coordination among MS and AC and through stakeholder and citizen engagement; 2) Improved research careers and working conditions in European R&I, by developing policy dialogue and solutions on inclusion and intersectionality, combating gender-based violence and promoting institutional changes through GEPs; 3) Increased research quality and social responsibility of knowledge through the integration of gender dimension in R&I; and 4) Reduced geographic inequality by targeting less experienced/engaged countries and regions.
project.title: Gender Equality Network to Develop ERA Communities To coordinate Inclusive and sustainable policy implementatiON
project.keywords: public policy, research and innovation, ERA, gender equality plans

article.title: Targeting a gender equality research network

result.title: Baseline document on current and future RFO preventive measures on GBV and SH
result.description: D3.2 Baseline document on current and future RFO preventive measures on GBV and SH (M 18): will provide a detailed overview of measures in place and under development in RFOs.

result.title: Benchmarking report on terminology and policy on intersectionality
result.description: 2.1 Benchmarking report on terminology and policy on intersectionality will map the current state of intersectionality and inclusiveness integration in R&I policies across MS and AC.

result.title: Report on policy coordination across MS and AC and promising practices to advance the gender dimension in R&I in the ERA
result.description: D4.3 Report on policy coordination across MS and AC and promising practices to advance the gender dimension in R&I in the ERA (M 36): will report on the strategic policy advice provided to stakeholders and promising practices identified.

result.title: Policy report on inclusive research careers
result.description: D 2.2. Policy report on inclusive research careers (M20): will deliver a comprehensive overview of R&I policies in inclusive careers in R&I across MS and AC.

result.title: Final evaluation report on capacity building and mutual learning
result.description: D7.2 Final evaluation report on capacity building and mutual learning (M35): will review and evaluate the outcomes of the actions over the course of the project in the two CoPs

result.title: Benchmarking report on GBV and SH targeting national authorities and RFOs
result.description: D3.1 Benchmarking report on GBV and SH targeting national authorities and RFOs (M 9): The objective of the report is to set a standard, with a special focus on RFOs based on synthesizing existing practices and policies.

result.title: Communication and dissemination plan and project promotion kit
result.description: D8.1 Communication and dissemination plan and project promotion kit (M3): will define the strategy for C&D&E, including a promotional kit.

result.title: An online template for a zero-tolerance policy on GBV and SH for RFOs
result.description: D3.3 An online template for a zero-tolerance policy on GBV and SH for RFOs (M 24): will provide a template for RFOs to guide the implementation of preventative measures.

result.title: Second report on monitoring ERA action implementation at national level
result.description: D5.2 Second report on monitoring ERA action implementation at national level (M30): The deliverable provides an updated analysis of ERA action implementation and an assessment of developments during the new ERA period.

result.title: Mid-term evaluation report on capacity building and mutual learning
result.description: D7.1 Mid-term evaluation report on capacity building and mutual learning (M16): will summarise and review the outcomes of the actions undertaken in the first half of the project in the two CoPs.

result.title: Final report on citizen and stakeholder engagement and implementation of impact plans
result.description: D.8.2 Final report on citizen and stakeholder engagement and implementation of impact plans (M35): will detail the different formats of citizen and stakeholder engagement events and their outcomes for the policy design process and summarise the NIP and EU impact plan activities and evaluate its implementation and achievements.

result.title: Benchmarking and assessment report on guidelines for sex/gender analysis
result.description: D4.1 Benchmarking and assessment report on guidelines for sex/gender analysis (M 12): will consist of a compendium of national guidelines and policies on the gender dimension in R&I and an analysis of the status and windows of opportunities regarding sex/gender analysis in the consortium.

result.title: First report on monitoring ERA action implementation at national level
result.description: D5.1 First report on monitoring ERA action implementation at national level (M15): The deliverable contains the principles of monitoring and the set of indicators for monitoring ERA action implementation. The report will cover the first year of ERA action implementation.

result.title: GEP impact evaluation system
result.description: D6.3 GEP impact evaluation system (M24): An evaluation system template will be developed, focusing on the evaluation of the impact of the implementation of actions that respond to high-level ERA gender equality priorities. This system will be focused rather than comprehensive, will inform national policy development in MS/AC regardless of maturity in terms of GE policy, but will be of most immediate relevance to MS/AC where GEPs have been in place for a number of years.

result.title: Assessment report on the national expertise mobilized to support NCPs
result.description: D4.2 Assessment report on the national expertise mobilized to support NCPs (M 27): will collect the results of the training and capacity-building provided to NCPs and will analyse the ways in which the project covered the needs of the NCPs regarding gender dimension in R&I.

result.title: Report on the RFO Community of Practice actions and achievements
result.description: D1.2 Report on the RFO Community of Practice actions and achievements (M36): will detail the work, outputs, and outcomes of the RFO CoP over the course of the project.

result.title: Project Handbook
result.description: Project Handbook is the primary reference supporting efficient project implementation.

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: Project Data Management Plan will be developed.

result.title: Benchmarking analysis and assessment report how MS monitor/evaluate institutional change through GEPs
result.description: D6.1 Benchmarking analysis and assessment report how MS monitor/evaluate institutional change through GEPs (M14): will benchmark practices across MS and AC in relation to the monitoring/evaluation of RPO GEPs at the state level.

result.title: Guidance on establishment of GEP monitoring systems
result.description: D6.2 Guidance on the establishment of GEP monitoring systems (M20): will provide concrete guidance on how to set up a monitoring system at the national authority level to monitor GEP implementation taking into account the variance in the maturity of national gender equality policy across MS/AC, with a particular focus on developing an adaptable system that meets the needs of both MS/AC where GEPs are a mandatory state requirement and where they are not.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
